Detailed Description

EAXListenerProps is used to set all EAX listener properties at once.

EAXListenerProps is derived from the EAX structure _EAXLISTENERPROPERTIES. The structure is made slightly more user friendly by providing a Clear() function which resets all EAX listener properties to their default values. The Clear() function is also automatically called when the structure is created. Because it is derived from _EAXLISTENERPROPERTIES, it can be used interchangeably with this structure since it is binary compatible.
